Key Updates
1. Simplify sign-in and Improve third-party logins.
2. Optimize the messaging tools.
3. Feedback for effects: we added a feature for you to rate your satisfaction with effect browsing and searching experiences.

Text Editing
1. Supports custom text rename.

Timeline Editing
1. Able to access to the properties panel when select multiple timeline.

Miscellaneous
1. Uniform the type of the Gif between cloud and local.
2. Able to sync the video cover and project template thumbnails.
3. Fixed some stuck and freeze issues.
